data.message: Eminem we will like you to send a positive massage to @AaronBadden @LaBanda a Latino Show in Univision channel to support him. He is a little rap guy that is trying to make his way on the music career. He is very good at. But in the show he also needs sings and he is not able to do so because of production! They just give him. Rap music to interpret/sing. Can you please help us?

replies.message: You should should send a message then, not a massage, unless it comes with a happy ending.
